item.title: Umbraco Forms Translations
item.description: Last year I evaluated the Umbraco Forms product to migrate some existing forms and build new ones. Despite being overall satisfied, I stumbled upon an issue with form control translation. The consent warning translations were not working. Being Umbraco a developer-friendly CMS, the workaround solution was easy enough to come by and extend with this piece of code: Anyway, the good news is the issue is closed as of today with a report that it’s working fine on the upcoming 8.
